content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Farhad. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to be a great investment. So, what price were you considering for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm looking for a fair price, Mister Schmidt. Since the apartment is newly built and in the city center, I expect it to be a bit higher than average. However, I'm also a student, so I'm hoping for the best. How much do you think is a reasonable price for this apartment?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your concern, Farhad. As a landlord, I always aim to provide the best accommodations to my tenants. For a property of this caliber, located in the heart of the city, I would expect a price that reflects its value. However, I'm willing to negotiate a fair price that suits both our needs. Would you have a specific number in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a student, I'm always looking for the best deal. I think a price that reflects the quality of the apartment while also being student-friendly would be ideal. Could we start with a lower number and work our way up if necessary?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Farhad. I'm open to starting with a lower number. How about we begin at €900 per month? This should be a reasonable starting point, considering the location and the amenities the apartment offers. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €900 per month is a good starting point, Mister Schmidt. It's definitely closer to what I was expecting. However, since the apartment is unfurnished, I was hoping for a slightly lower price. Could we perhaps negotiate a bit lower? Perhaps €850 per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your request, Farhad. However, €850 per month is quite a bit lower than my initial offer. The location of this apartment is prime, and it's quite rare to find such a property at that price. But since you're a student, I'm willing to make an exception. How about we settle at €875 per month? This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair compromise. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €875 per month is a very fair offer, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. As a student, every euro counts, so this price would be very beneficial for me. I agree to the price of €875 per month! TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
